Power Puff Pixies?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Power Puff Pixies?
By Know it all-most on Monday, June 16, 2008 - 05:02 pm:

I know that it's alluring to train a Pixie with as much intelligence as possible, but I've started to consider the move "Hard Breaker."

I have a Pixie/Joker which is very young. I do not have the move "Hard Breaker" yet, but I'm wondering if I should train it's power more for this move? Is it really worth it to waste some training on such a move? It seems like most of its moves are extremely weak, and even "Star Gather" doesn't have that punch that something like "Golden Arm" does with a Garu.

Is it really worth it to train its power for such a good move? Even Windy Lance has a good damage rate and would probably be useful because of its low guts cost. Such an accuracy rate with force "S" is definitely possessing potential.

I do recall Radiance from MR3 with more power than intelligence. It seemed almost wasteful with only two power moves, but with Hard Breaker it may be worth a shot....
